alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 9:51AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Light to Moderate Snow Continues Through the Day... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Light to possibly moderate snow. Additional accumulations less than an inch are expected in the lower elevations, with 1 to 2 more inches in the higher elevations. Gusty northeast wind will create blowing snow as well. * WHERE...Lower elevations of Fremont County, the east slope of the Wind River Range, and the Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Ranges. * WHEN...Now through 3 PM today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel on roadways will be impacted by winter driving conditions and lowered visibility at times today. Blowing and drifting snow will occur. This includes Wyoming Highway 28 around Red Canyon and over South Pass, and US 287 from Lander to Fort Washakie.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East
